Articles.Content:
HI all -

Modders - Quite simply , Thank you!  Due to your skills, dedication and determination, we all can all enjoy KSP the way that we want to.  I have said this before, I am not a 'rocket' enthusiast; with many of the mods available for KSP.  It is helped me [and others] ease into rockets and planes and... have fun.

Community - Hands down, the best!  The most supportive, enthusiastic one there is around.  It there was any more support, I think there would be a lines for free pancakes or pizza.  [crosses fingers]

Squad - You folks , well - I used up all the really good adjectives above, so about high fives, chest bumps and a group hug?

EDIT: I just realized, that posted this in the incorrect area, so I am sure it will get moved to the correct area. 

Edited November 7, 2016 by gamerscircle

:'^)

Edited November 7, 2016 by VenomousRequiem

:-^)

F

Edited November 7, 2016 by CobaltWolf

It can be a little criticism? I'm a straight man so do not be offended.

Modders so much that I think in the game played by only 10% of the community, and 90% modders, including me.

Community is not as perfect as described, for example, when  write from time to time in PM amazing questions, such as which category is the fuselage, or how to open it, it's ok ??? The community is very lazy.

43 minutes ago, DECQ said:

It can be a little criticism? I'm a straight man so do not be offended.

Modders so much that I think in the game played by only 10% of the community, and 90% modders, including me.

Community is not as perfect as described, for example, when  write from time to time in PM amazing questions, such as which category is the fuselage, or how to open it, it's ok ??? The community is very lazy.

Well that's just gamers (heck people) in general. They don't want to take the time to even try to figure something out. But overall, I think the KSP community is quite good compared to many others and the modders are amazing.

19 minutes ago, Nori said:

Well that's just gamers (heck people) in general. They don't want to take the time to even try to figure something out. But overall, I think the KSP community is quite good compared to many others and the modders are amazing.

Of course, I do not speak for all the community, in the community a lot of great people, but when PM ask idiotic questions, most stupid about how to open the fuselage this not normal.
